# Digital resurrection! 
I am happy to be online with this new personal homepage. I plan to regularly update this website with news from my research and activities. Building this website was a very pleasant experience, thanks to:   

*   The <a href="https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/">R Blogdown </a> package  
*   The <a href="https://gohugo.io"> Hugo </a> static website builder  
*   The <a href="https://wowchemy.com/hugo-themes/">wowchemy academic </a> theme  
*   A great <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8xbxXR_Iu5Y&list=PLpZT7JPM8_GbPiX4ibrP7ogl7GyEofZMj"> online tutorial </a> by Jenny Sloane and Tehilla Ostrovsky
